channel.title: I know this is a long shot but
channel.description:
do any of you know a free host with these specs
15-20mb diskspace 500mb bandwidth 1 domain name 1 sub domain open ssl *required preferably cpanel nothing else required

item.title: I know this is a long shot but
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“error.login, post:4, topic:191777”][quote author=ThatOneServer link=topic=255449.msg2128027#msg2128027 date=1206230154]

  • 500 megabytes of storage space
  • 10,000 megabytes of monthly transfer (10Gb’s)
  • 3 FTP Accounts
  • 10 E-Mail accounts w/spam block
  • 5 MySQL Databases
  • 1 Sub Domain
  • 1 Parked Domain

How much you ask?
100% free. No strings attached.

http://webhosting.nationvoice.com/ … cpanel
[/quote]
ssl?

What do you mean by one domain name?:S I may be wrong, but i dont think people give away TLD’s for free much.

and so i can use my domain name.[/quote]
yes

[quote=“Son of Saetan, post:6, topic:191777”]x10hosting.com

Im pretty sure that complies with all your requests, it has cPanel 11 (awesome shit) and they have a good support forum.[/quote]
open ssl *required

Read full topic
